list.abs: i wanna know it all , everything ., 我要知道所有的事 , 全部.
everyone knows that it all comes down to money , and to say otherwise to announce your naivety .每个人都知道这些问题最终只会归结到金钱上，而那些宣称“另有选择”的人，只是在表明他们很傻很天真。
... sb.’s misjudgment about… 某人对……的错误判断 a know-it-all 自以为无所不知的人 be inclusive to differences 包容差异.
万事通先生（the know-it-all） 半瓶醋先生（the think-they-know-all） 好好先生（the yes person） 或许先生（the maybe person）  …

entry.tran: 自以为无所不知的人；百事通
entry.def: If you say that someone is a know-it-all, you are critical of them because they think that they know a lot more than other people.

means.word_mean: 1. someone who thinks he knows everything and refuses to accept advice or information from others

auth_sentence.content: Some people want to milk it all they can.
auth_sentence.res_content: Some people want to milk it all they can.

auth_sentence.content: Traditionalists may find it all a bit too much.

auth_sentence.content: The marathon was the perfect finale to it all.
